about.title: About us
about.text: The Department of Information Technology and Digital Economy provides training in three levels of education: bachelor degree, magistracy, and postgraduate studies. The creative, energetic and methodically verified approach of our teachers to their work guarantees you a high-quality and modern education.
about.text2: Today the labor market is based on the requirements of widespread digitalization and automation of business processes, on increasing the role of information and communication technologies and expanding their availability. The Department of IT and DE trains highly qualified professionals with a set of knowledge and skills in the implementation of advanced information technologies in industry, trade, the financial sector, and the state apparatus.

spheres.title: Spheres of professional activity of graduates
spheres.text: Graduates will be able to work as 3D developers, BI architects, cloud service engineers, web programmers, information security analysts, data analysts, data researchers, big data analysts, IT service engineers, software architects, computer systems analysts, engineers labor organization, planning specialists, directors of the oil depot, engineers for the organization and regulation of labor, managers, dispatchers of oil refineries, managers of oil and gas projects, etc.
